duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a marketing technology roadmap, planning, and process improvement.
Manage the Firm’s marketing technology stack, including website, CRM, ERM, email marketing automation, experience database, and social media.
Collaborate with senior leadership and IT teams to leverage technology tools to support Firm goals.
Track and measure performance, ensuring email campaigns are correctly launched, delivered on time, accurately tracked, and continually improved upon.
Stay abreast of industry trends and competitors’ sites to identify areas for improvement.

Work with the Marketing Leadership team to develop relevant KPIs, metrics, dashboards and reporting analytics to measure the effectiveness of the marketing channels/tactics and marketing strategies and influence the content strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, marketing, business or technical communications preferred. (Master's preferred)
